title: breakdown
desc: Takes a provided phone string and breaks it down into an object of codes
examples: const obj = breakdown('111-222-3333'); // => { areaCode: '111', localCode: '222', lineNumber: '3333' }const obj = breakdown('17875554441111', 'longDistance'); // => { areaCode: '555', localCode: '444', lineNumber: '1111', countryCode: 1787 }const obj = breakdown('555-444-3333 x 8989'); // => { areaCode: '555', localCode: '444', lineNumber: '3333', extension: 8989 }

params.description: Boolean setting long distance to true of false
params.name: isLD

params.description: The layout from format to find country and extension codes
params.name: layout

returns.description: Returns an object of the broken down phone number

title: find
desc: Find a piece of the phone number and return it
examples:
const results = find('555-444-1111', 'areaCode'); // => '555'
const results = find('555-444-1111', 'localCode'); // => '444'
const results = find('555-444-1111', 'lineNumber'); // => '1111'
const results = find('1555-444-1111', 'countryCode'); // => '1'
const results = find('555-444-1111 8989', 'extension'); // => '8989'

params.description: The piece of the phone to look for
params.name: type

returns.description: Returns a string from the desired part of the phone number

title: format
desc: Allows you to format phone numbers however you desire
examples: const results = format('444-555-6666', '(AAA) LLL.NNNN'); // => '(444) 555.6666'const results = format('1444-555-6666', 'C + (AAA) LLL.NNNN', true); // => '1 + (444) 555.6666'const results = format('444-555-66668989', '(AAA) LLL.NNNN x EEEE'); // => '(444) 555.6666 x 8989'

params.description: The desired layout of the phone number
params.name: layout

params.description: Boolean setting long distance to true of false
params.name: isLD

returns.description: Returns a string which is the formatted phone number

title: getCountries
desc: Grabs all of the countries (and their alternate names) for the provided country calling code
examples:
const results = getCountries('1');// => [
		'canada',
		'ca',
		'united states',
		'us',
		'usa',
		'united states of america'
		]

params.description: The country code to use for searching
params.name: code

returns.description: Returns an array of country names and their aliases

title: getCountryCode
desc: Grabs the calling code for the provided country from the callingCodes.json

params.description: The country name to search with
params.name: country

returns.description: Returns an array of country codes

title: identical
desc: Checks if the two provided numbers are identical or not

returns.description: Returns a boolean if the numbers provided to match

title: isValid
desc: Checks if the phone number is valid or not
examples: const results = isValid('555-444-3333'); // => trueconst results = isValid('1 + (555) 444 3333', 'usa'); // => trueconst results = isValid('9885554443333', 'usa'); // => false

params.description: The country name to validate with
params.name: country

returns.description: Returns a boolean if the number provided is valid or not

title: uglify
desc: Strips all of the special characters from the given string

params.description: The phone number to trim and strip down
params.name: phone

returns.description: Returns the newly created phone number string
